participant_1.background:
I ride my bicycle to work.
I'm not rich, but I think it would be fun to try my luck at horse racing.
I decided to turn my life around and focus on my passions.
i hate skiing.
my favorite band is worn.

participant_2.background:
I am a swimmer who is proud of my family but sometimes feel disconnected from them.
I make sure my beta fish travels with me when I move.
I bought a set of dice for my favorite tabletop game.
I love my family and friends because they support me and help me grow.
I don't go to Comic Con because it is not my kind of thing.

content.text: Hi there!
Hello! How are you doing today?
I'm doing well! I just got back from a bike ride.
That sounds like fun! I wish I could ride my bike more often, but I live in a city and it's not very bike-friendly.
I know what you mean. I live in a city too, but I found a great bike trail that I can use.
That's awesome! I'll have to look into that.
You should! It's a great way to get some exercise and enjoy the outdoors.
I definitely will!
What do you do for fun?
I'm a swimmer, and I also love to play tabletop games.
Oh cool! I've never been a swimmer, but I've always wanted to try.
You should! It's a great way to get in shape and it's really fun.
Maybe I will!
What's your favorite tabletop game?
I like Dungeons & Dragons.
Oh cool! I've never played that, but I've heard good things about it.
It's a lot of fun! It's a role-playing game where you create a character and go on adventures.
That sounds really cool! I might have to try it sometime.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
